Query.Sql: select patient_identifier_Value, beg_dt_tm, end_dt_tm, lower(replace(catalog, 'zzz', '')) as catalog, lower(order_mnemonic) as order_mnemonic, order_detail_display_line, lower(rxroute) as rxroute, strengthdoseunit, strengthdose, EVENT_ID from omop_staging.oxford_prescribing where concept_identifier is null order by patient_identifier_Value, beg_dt_tm, end_dt_tm, catalog, order_mnemonic, order_detail_display_line, rxroute, strengthdoseunit, strengthdose, EVENT_ID

Explanation.Description: The prescribed drug item as showing in the order screen as selected by the clinician
The mnemonic of the prescribed drug item as showing in the order screen as selected by the clinician
The begin date of the Drug that was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.
The end date of the Drug that was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.
All the prescribed drug item details as shown in the order screen as selected by the clinician
The unit of the drug dose
The unit of the drug dose
